cards.name: Aesthir Glider
cards.text:
Flying
Aesthir Glider can't block.
cards.flavor:
"A fine example of the rewards of artifice: a thoroughly obedient steed with wings of Soldevi steel."
—Arcum Dagsson,
Soldevi Machinist

cards.name: Armageddon
cards.text: Destroy all lands.

cards.name: Armored Pegasus
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.

cards.name: Benalish Knight
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor:
"We called them ‘armored lightning.'"
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Black Knight
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)
cards.flavor: Battle doesn't need a purpose; the battle is its own purpose. You don't ask why a plague spreads or a field burns. Don't ask why I fight.

cards.name: Brushland
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Canopy Spider
cards.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor:
"We know our place in the cycle of life—and it is not as flies."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

cards.name: Carnivorous Plant
cards.text: Defender
cards.flavor:
"It had a mouth like that of a great beast, and gnashed its teeth as it strained to reach us. I am thankful it possessed no means of locomotion."
—Vervamon the Elder

cards.name: Combat Medic
cards.text: {1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Without Combat Medics, Icatia would probably not have withstood the forces of chaos as long as it did."
—Sarpadian Empires, vol. VI

cards.name: Cuombajj Witches
cards.text: {T}: Cuombajj Witches deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to target creature or player of an opponent's choice.

cards.name: Disenchant
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.name: Drifting Meadow
cards.text:
Drifting Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Erhnam Djinn
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep.

cards.name: Feast of the Unicorn
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +4/+0.
cards.flavor:
"Could there be a fouler act? No doubt the baron knows of one."
—Autumn Willow

cards.name: Fireball
cards.text:
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

cards.name: Freewind Falcon
cards.text: Flying, protection from red
cards.flavor:
"That does it! I'm going back to hunting chickens!"
—Rhirhok, goblin archer

cards.name: Giant Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Giant Spider
cards.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor: While it possesses potent venom, the Giant Spider often chooses not to paralyze its victims. Perhaps the creature enjoys the gentle rocking motion caused by its captives' struggles to escape its web.

cards.name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
cards.text: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"From up here we can drop rocks and arrows and more rocks!"
"Uh, yeah boss, but how do we get down?"

cards.name: Goblin Digging Team
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.
cards.flavor:
"From down here we can make the whole wall collapse!"
"Uh, yeah, boss, but how do we get out?"

cards.name: Goblin Grenade
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Goblin Grenade, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"I don't suppose we could teach them to throw the cursed things?"
—Ivra Jursdotter

cards.name: Goblin Hero
cards.flavor:
"When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero—everyone else just has to step back!"
—Biggum Flodrot, goblin veteran

cards.name: Goblin King
cards.text: Other Goblin creatures get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
cards.flavor: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok . . . ."

cards.name: Goblin Matron
cards.text: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Goblin Mutant
cards.text:
Trample
Goblin Mutant can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater.
Goblin Mutant can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.

cards.name: Goblin Offensive
cards.text: Put X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: They certainly are.

cards.name: Goblin Recruiter
cards.text: When Goblin Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Goblin cards and reveal those cards. Shuffle your library, then put them on top of it in any order.
cards.flavor: "Next!"

cards.name: Goblin Snowman
cards.text:
Whenever Goblin Snowman blocks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by it this turn.
{T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.
cards.flavor:
"Strength in numbers? Right."
—Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

cards.name: Goblin Tinkerer
cards.text: {R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. That artifact deals damage equal to its converted mana cost to Goblin Tinkerer.
cards.flavor:
"Can they do that?"
—Imwita, Zhalfirin artificer, last words

cards.name: Goblin Vandal
cards.text: Whenever Goblin Vandal attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {R}. If you do, destroy target artifact defending player controls and Goblin Vandal assigns no combat damage this turn.

cards.name: Goblin Warrens
cards.text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late." —Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

cards.name: Gorilla Chieftain
cards.text: {1}{G}: Regenerate Gorilla Chieftain.
cards.flavor:
"Oh, no—not you again?"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Hurricane
cards.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
cards.flavor:
"The raging winds . . . , settling on the sea, the surges sweep, / Raise liquid mountains, and disclose the deep."
—Virgil, Aeneid, Book I, trans. Dryden

cards.name: Hymn to Tourach
cards.text: Target player discards two cards at random.

cards.name: Hypnotic Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Hypnotic Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

cards.name: Icatian Javelineers
cards.text:
Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it.
{T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: Icatian Javelineers deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Ihsan's Shade
cards.text: Protection from white
cards.flavor:
"Ihsan, the weak. Ihsan, the fallen. Ihsan, the betrayer. He has brought shame to the Serra Paladins where none existed before. May his suffering equal his betrayal."
—Baris, Serra Inquisitor

cards.name: Infantry Veteran
cards.text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war."
—Telim'Tor

cards.name: Jalum Tome
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: This timeworn relic was responsible for many of Urza's victories, though he never fully comprehended its mystic runes.

cards.name: Knight of Stromgald
cards.text:
Protection from white
{B}: Knight of Stromgald gains first strike until end of turn.
{B}{B}: Knight of Stromgald gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Lady Orca
cards.flavor: "I do not remember what he said to her. I remember her fiery eyes, fixed upon him for an instant. I remember a flash, and the hot breath of sudden flames made me turn away. When I looked again, Angus was gone." —A Wayfarer, on meeting Lady Orca

cards.name: Lightning Bolt
cards.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Llanowar Elves
cards.text: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

cards.name: Mirri, Cat Warrior
cards.text: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, it can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

cards.name: Mogg Fanatic
cards.text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: "I got it! I got it! I—"

cards.name: Mogg Flunkies
cards.text: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.
cards.flavor: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

cards.name: Mogg Raider
cards.text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The evisceration of one mogg always cheers up the rest.

cards.name: Nevinyrral's Disk
cards.text:
Nevinyrral's Disk enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

cards.name: Order of the White Shield
cards.text:
Protection from black
{W}: Order of the White Shield gains first strike until end of turn.
{W}{W}: Order of the White Shield gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: A shield of light admits no shadow.

cards.name: Overrun
cards.text: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"You want to know your enemy? Look at your feet while you trample him."
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Pacifism
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
cards.flavor: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

cards.name: Pegasus Charger
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor:
"The clouds came alive and dove to the earth! Hooves flashed among the dark army, who fled before the spectacle of fury."
—Song of All, canto 211

cards.name: Pegasus Stampede
cards.text:
Buyback—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Pendelhaven
cards.text:
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "This is the forest primeval. The murmuring pines and the hemlocks . . . / Stand like Druids of old." —Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, "Evangeline"

cards.name: Polluted Mire
cards.text:
Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Pyrokinesis
cards.text:
You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay Pyrokinesis's mana cost.
Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

cards.name: Pyrotechnics
cards.text: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
cards.flavor:
"Hi! ni! ya! Behold the man of flint, that's me! / Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return."
—Navajo war chant

cards.name: Raging Goblin
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
cards.flavor: Charging alone takes uncommong daring or uncommon stupidity. Or both.

cards.name: Ranger en-Vec
cards.text:
First strike
{G}: Regenerate Ranger en-Vec.
cards.flavor:
"The path of least resistance will seldom lead you beyond your doorstep."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Samite Healer
cards.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
cards.flavor: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

cards.name: Scavenger Folk
cards.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.
cards.flavor: String, weapons, wax, or jewels—it makes no difference. Leave nothing unguarded in Scarwood.

cards.name: Serra Angel
cards.text:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
cards.flavor: Born with wings of light and a sword of faith, this heavenly incarnation embodies both fury and purity.

cards.name: Serrated Arrows
cards.text:
Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it.
{T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

cards.name: Slippery Karst
cards.text:
Slippery Karst enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Smoldering Crater
cards.text:
Smoldering Crater enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

cards.name: Spectral Bears
cards.text: Whenever Spectral Bears attacks, if defending player controls no black nontoken permanents, it doesn't untap during your next untap step.
cards.flavor: "I hear there are Bears—or spirits—that guard caravans passing through the forest." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

cards.name: Strip Mine
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.
cards.flavor: Unlike previous conflicts, the war between Urza and Mishra made Dominia itself a casualty of war.

cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

cards.name: Terror
cards.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Unholy Strength
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

cards.name: Uthden Troll
cards.text: {R}: Regenerate Uthden Troll.
cards.flavor:
"Oi oi oi, me gotta hurt in 'ere,
Oi oi oi, me smell a ting is near,
Gonna bosh 'n gonna nosh
'n da hurt'll disappear."
—Troll chant

cards.name: Volcanic Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
cards.flavor: Speed and fire are always a deadly combination.

cards.name: Warrior's Honor
cards.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"We are to be bound together as the reeds of a basket."
—Asmira, Rashida, and Jabari, unity chant

cards.name: White Knight
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
cards.flavor: Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the knight had just laid waste.

cards.name: Woolly Spider
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a Spider without an appetite."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

cards.name: Youthful Knight
cards.text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor:
"Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die."
—Oracle en-Vec
